abstract: Washington State task force reports that Pasco police officers involved in death of Antonio Zambrano-Montes fired 17 shots, including five or six that struck him but none that hit him in the back.
lead_paragraph: The three officers involved in the death of an unarmed Mexican man in Pasco, Wash., fired 17 shots, including five or six that struck him but none that hit him in the back, a task force spokesman said Wednesday.

headline.main: Washington: Police Fired 17 Shots at Man Killed While Throwing Rocks
headline.print_headline: Washington: Police Fired 17 Shots at Man Killed While Throwing Rocks

snippet: The three officers involved in the death of an unarmed Mexican man in Pasco, Wash., fired 17 shots, including five or six that struck him but none that hit him in the back, a task force spokesman said Wednesday.
